entry.title: OpenSea Confirms It Will Start Listing Solana NFTs in April
entry.summary: Collections like Solana Monkey Business, Degenerate Apes, and Aurory appear headed to OpenSea after the firm confirms recent leaks.

entry.title: Hacker Drains $622M From Axie Infinity’s Ronin Ethereum Sidechain
entry.summary: The Ronin bridge was drained of 173,600 ETH and 25.5M USDC via the use of “hacked private keys,” Sky Mavis says.

entry.title: Solana NFT Platform Snowcrash Taps Civic to Combat Bots
entry.summary: Snowcrash says the goal of its partnership with Civic is to protect the users of the new platform.

entry.title: How Crypto Tax Software Can Simplify Your Taxes
entry.summary: Preparing the paperwork for your crypto taxes needn’t be a chore, with tax software like Koinly streamlining the process.

entry.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022
entry.summary: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."

entry.title: Ethereum NFT Game Sorare Signs Major League Soccer Amid US Expansion
entry.summary: The NFT-based fantasy soccer game aims to enter additional sports and U.S. leagues.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Takes Out $205M Bitcoin-Backed Loan to Buy More Bitcoin
entry.summary: A subsidiary of Michael Saylor’s MicroStrategy is leveraging its Bitcoin to buy more Bitcoin with a $205 million loan from Silvergate Bank.

entry.title: Caitlin Long: How JP Morgan Flipped Goldman Sachs in Crypto
entry.summary: Longtime banker turned crypto executive Caitlin Long says Goldman was the big bank most open to crypto, until JP Morgan "ended up flipping" Goldman.

entry.title: MAC Cosmetics Releases Keith Haring Polygon NFTs with ConsenSys
entry.summary: Proceeds from the NFT sales will support youth impacted by HIV/AIDS.

entry.title: Ethereum Layer-2 DeFi Money Market zkLend Lands $5M Raise
entry.summary: zkLend has raised $5 million to build out its speedy, low-cost lending and borrowing protocol using the Ethereum scaling solution zk-Rollups.

entry.title: Ripple Co-Founder Backs Controversial Campaign to Move Bitcoin to Proof of Stake
entry.summary: Environmental activist groups as well as the CEO and co-founder of Ripple have joined forces to campaign for a code change to Bitcoin.

entry.title: Terra's LUNA Sets New All-Time High Following $135 Million Bitcoin Buy
entry.summary: Terra's token LUNA hit an all-time high after the project's founder and CEO confirmed that it had bought over $1 billion in Bitcoin since January.

entry.title: Biden Eyes $5 Billion in 2023 Revenue From Applying New Tax Reporting Rules to Crypto
entry.summary: The president released a detailed budget proposal on Monday.

entry.title: WWE Signs Deal to Launch NFTs Through Fanatics’ Candy Digital
entry.summary: The NFT digital trading cards will feature famous wrestlers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Has Now Wiped Away 2022 Losses—Here's Why
entry.summary: As Bitcoin recoups its 2022 losses, analysts point to macro events in the market, like D.C. regulators, stablecoin chatter, and fading worries about COVID.

entry.title: World of Women Galaxy Ethereum NFT Drop Generates $79M in a Day
entry.summary: The rising World of Women NFT project gets a sci-fi twist with its new Galaxy collection—and it’s selling like hotcakes.

entry.title: Grayscale Considers Flipping the Script and Suing SEC Over Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: "I think all options are on the table," Grayscale CEO Michael Sonnenshein told Bloomberg.

entry.title: Coinbase Seeks Bodyguards With Tactical Driving Skills, Positive Energy
entry.summary: A new LinkedIn posting from Coinbase asks for some qualifications not typically found among crypto professionals.

entry.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help
entry.summary: Koinly is a leading crypto tax software service. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at Koinly, shares tips for this year's tax season.

entry.title: Someone Just Sold a Bored Ape Ethereum NFT for Only $115
entry.summary: Did the seller accidentally accept 115 DAI instead of ETH, or is this an exploit or some kind of tax loss harvesting scheme?

entry.title: Congress Is Discussing a Digital Dollar Pilot. It's Not What You Think
entry.summary: Rep. Stephen Lynch introduced the ECASH Act. It's a CBDC without the CB.

entry.title: Polygon NFT Game Cross the Ages Raises $12M in Round Backed by Ubisoft, Animoca
entry.summary: Based on a book series, the collectible card game will offer both Polygon NFTs and physical cards to players.

entry.title: NFTs: What Are They Worth?
entry.summary: Non-fungible tokens are selling for thousands or even millions of dollars—but assigning a dollar value to them is complicated.

entry.title: European Union Proposes Crackdown on Non-Custodial Crypto Wallets
entry.summary: Firms interacting with non-custodial crypto wallets would be expected to collect personal details about the wallet’s owner, according to a new proposal.

entry.title: Google Searches for ‘Ethereum Merge’ Have Hit an All-Time High
entry.summary: Canadians, Australians, and Singaporeans were the most curious to know about Ethereum’s imminent upgrade.

entry.title: Crypto Tax Guide: NFTs and DeFi
entry.summary: Innovations like NFTs and DeFi raise questions for crypto taxpayers about how to report them for tax purposes. Here's our handy guide.

entry.title: $140 Million in Bitcoin Shorts Liquidated As Crypto Market Cap Hits $2.1 Trillion
entry.summary: Amid a wider rally in crypto markets, altcoins Filecoin and Internet Computer have seen double-digit gains in the last 24 hours.

entry.title: Japan Targets Crypto Loophole to Halt Russian Sanctions Evasion
entry.summary: Japan is revising its foreign exchange legislation to crack down on the risk of Russia using crypto to evade sanctions.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Spike 5% Amid Crypto Market Sunday Surge
entry.summary: After a stale first quarter, the entire cryptocurrency market appears to be picking back up—for the moment.

entry.title: The Biggest Celebrity NFT Owners in the Bored Ape Yacht Club
entry.summary: Eminem, Jimmy Fallon, Steph Curry, Post Malone, and a dozen other high-profile celebs are now holders of the popular Ethereum NFT collection.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Buterin Wants BAYC to Fund Public Goods, Bukele Rails Against Media
entry.summary: Buterin clarified that he doesn't hate Apes, he just wants them to have a more meaningful impact. Madonna, meanwhile, just wants an Ape.

entry.title: African Digital Art Network Launches Nandi NFT Marketplace on Celo
entry.summary: The new platform aims to be a way for Black artists and creators to showcase their talent—and get paid for their work.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Leading Coins Rise Again as Florida to 'Figure Out' Accepting Bitcoin For Taxes
entry.summary: Meanwhile, Thailand banned crypto, and Russia signaled to allies it would begin accepting Bitcoin for natural gas exports.

entry.title: MakerDAO's DAI Fell Behind Terra's UST Months Ago. Here's How It's Trying to Catch Up
entry.summary: MakerDAO has either implemented or is currently mulling over new updates to help improve the adoption of its stablecoin.

entry.title: Avalanche's AVAX Seeing Boost From Subnets Chatter
entry.summary: AVAX was on a tear all week before it fell back on Saturday—and the rise wasn't just about the Avalanche Summit in Barcelona. It's about subnets.

entry.title: Vitalik Is the Crypto Hero We Don't Deserve
entry.summary: The boy genius of Ethereum greets the slings and arrows of Twitter trolls and "co-founders" with grace and restraint, a rarity among crypto figures.

entry.title: The Crypto Taxman is Coming. Should You Be Worried?
entry.summary: Millions of people made money on crypto last year, and now the IRS is looking for its cut. Here's how to stay out of trouble.

entry.title: Ukraine Launches NFT Museum of War on Ethereum and Polygon
entry.summary: Proceeds from NFT sales will go to the Ukraine Ministry of Digital Transformation.

entry.title: Cool Cats Ethereum NFT Project Signs With CAA for Media, Licensing Push
entry.summary: We could see Cool Cats cartoons, merch, and events after the profile picture project nets a major Hollywood agency.

entry.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs
entry.summary: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.

entry.title: Bitcoin Regains Ground as Price Edges Closer to $45,000
entry.summary: Ethereum is also up, and most of the crypto market has had a solid week.

entry.title: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen: Crypto Innovation 'Can Be a Healthy Thing'
entry.summary: Yellen is working to implement President Biden's crypto executive order.

entry.title: Crypto Artist XCOPY Sells $23M Worth of Ethereum NFTs in 10 Minutes
entry.summary: XCOPY’s single-edition grails often resell for millions apiece, and his latest open edition on Nifty Gateway saw immense demand.

entry.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'
entry.summary: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.

entry.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant
entry.summary: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.

entry.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.

entry.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO
entry.summary: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Governments and Crypto, CBDCs, and Ethereum vs Bitcoin at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: Edward Snowden gives an extensive interview to Marta Belcher of Filecoin Foundation for Camp Ethereal 2022, taped on February 27. He talks about how governments view crypto as "an evolving threat," how crypto "transforms power relationships," why he thinks Ethereum "suffers from the same privacy problems as Bitcoin," and why he views central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as "crypto-fascist currencies."

entry.title: Musician Dillon Francis on Ethereum vs Solana for NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis and Big Night Entertainment managing partner Tim Bonito tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their deal for a Boston nightclub residency and record collaboration with DJ duo ESCAPΞPLAN, and give their takes on Ethereum vs Solana for buying and trading NFTs.

entry.title: Musician Dillon Francis: Why I'm Getting Into NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin what drew him to NFTs, and heaps a lot of praise on DJ 3LAU for pioneering in the space and prompting more artists to get in.

entry.title: Joe Lubin Talks Ethereum 2.0, NFTs, and DAOs at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin talked about Ethereum 2.0 timing and impact, the power of DAOs, and gave his honest take on NFTs, Solana, Polygon, and Biden's crypto executive order in an extensive fireside chat with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.

entry.title: Crypto and Effective Altruism: Sam Bankman-Fried Interviews Peter Singer at Camp Ethereal
entry.summary: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried sits down for a conversation with one of his heroes, the moral philosopher and Princeton University professor Peter Singer, exclusively for Camp Ethereal 2022, powered by Decrypt. They talk animal rights, climate change, effective giving, Bitcoin's energy use, and how crypto is helping Ukraine.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Biden's Executive Order & Ethereal 2022
entry.summary: Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Decrypt Daily podcast host Matthew Diemer chat live in Wyoming about the crypto executive order and other insights from Camp Ethereal 2022.

entry.title: Decrypting the Week 10: Ukraine Welcomes Crypto
entry.summary: As Russia’s invasion of Ukraine continues, Ukraine has raised more than $50 million in crypto donations—in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polkadot, and even Dogecoin. Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Scott Chipolina, and Kate Irwin, joined by special guest Izabella Kaminska of The Blind Spot, discuss the biggest story in the world right now.

entry.title: Muneeb Ali: It's 'Easy to Make Fun' of NFTs, But They Are Here to Stay
entry.summary: On Episode 4 of Decrypt's gm podcast, Muneeb Ali of Stacks gave Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts his take on why NFTs are so triggering to people. He understands why they're easy to make fun of or "dismiss as a toy," but expects them to be used for a whole range of important business purposes in the future.

entry.title: NBA Alum Metta World Peace and Raymond Dong of Blanksoles Talk NFTs
entry.summary: Blanksoles, a decentralized sneaker company, announced a partnership with former NBA champion Metta Sandiford-Artest—better known as Metta World Peace, and before that Ron Artest—to launch "Metta Designsoles," a series of limited edition Solana-based NFTs and physical sneakers. They discuss with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 4: Fighting Bitcoin Maximalism with Muneeb Ali
entry.summary: Muneeb Ali is a Bitcoin OG whose project Stacks, formerly Blockstack, pulled off the first SEC-approved token sale for its STX token. But even though Muneeb has become the leading advocate for building dapps on top of the Bitcoin blockchain, don't call him a Bitcoin maximalist. He tells Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts on the gm how he fends off maximalists on Twitter, what he'd do if he were Twitter CEO, and how the Stacks ecosystem is growing.
